page.title: 12Joanne Aged 10/Creca
page.content: My name is Joanne, I am ten years old and live in Creca. I go to Newington school in Annan. The bus picks me up at 8.30am and brings me home at 4.30pm. I have to get up about half past seven to get washed and have my breakfast before leaving to wait for the bus. My favourite subjects at school are writing stories, history and maths. I have been picked to play a brass instrument but I would prefer to play the guitar. On Tuesday, after school, I go to Highland dancing classes. Most weeks my mum takes us swimming at the pool in Annan. I have three badges for swimming. I collect rubbers and have 97 of them. I have a B.M.X. bike and like going out on it. I usually do my homework before tea and afterwards I can watch television or play with friends. I like to read when I go to bed.
